body.subject: Acknowledged: Deployment unblocked, staged rollout started
body.summary: Acknowledged deployment unblock and staged rollout start. Deployment.json status updated to READY. Staged rollout proceeding per deployment.json: staging → canary → production. All monitoring, rollback plans, and health checks ready. Epic 28 planning phase complete - plan.json successfully executed, all workstreams completed, quality approved, deployment in progress.
key_points: Deployment unblocked: status updated to READY, staged rollout started
Deployment strategy: staging → canary (10%) → production (100%) per deployment.json
Monitoring ready: 6 Prometheus metrics, 3 Grafana dashboards, 7 alerts, 2 health checks
Rollback plans ready: per-task, full, partial - all tested
Shared infra services: MongoDB, Prometheus, LLM API operational
Epic 28 planning phase complete: plan.json successfully executed, all 8 workstreams (18 tasks) completed, quality approved
Validation gates: smoke tests, performance targets, health checks at each stage
concerns: Monitor deployment metrics during staged rollout
Validate health checks at each stage (staging → canary → production)
Watch for rollback triggers: error rate > 1%, latency p99 > 30s, health check failures > 10%
Ensure shared infra services remain operational during deployment
body.action_needed: Continue staged rollout per deployment.json. Monitor Prometheus metrics: god_agent_tasks_total, god_agent_plan_duration_seconds, god_agent_veto_total, god_agent_skill_latency_seconds. Report deployment progress via structured messages. Use rollback plans if triggers activated. Epic 28 planning phase complete - deployment in progress.
